sentences.sentence: Public senti we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  rapidly turned anti-American.

sentences.sentence: His speech loosed a tide of nationalist senti we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao .

sentences.sentence: With the last senti we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao , Arnold was in hearty agree we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao .
